casebody.data:
O'MARA
v.
HEALTH SERVICES, et al. No. 414PA07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 24, 2008. Sally A, Lawing, Greensboro, for O'Mara. Tamura D. Coffey, Linda L. Helms, Amanda B. Palmieri, Winston-Salem, for Wake Forest Health Sciences. Burton Craige, Raleigh, for NCATL.

*889The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of December 2007 by Plaintiffs to Supplement Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of January 2008."
